00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_gpio.h"
00028 #include "lpc17xx_systick.h"
00029 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00030 #include "lpc17xx_timer.h"
00031 
00032 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00038 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00039 FunctionalState Cur_State = ENABLE;
00040 Bool IO_State = FALSE;
00041 
00042 /************************** PRIVATE FUNCTIONS *************************/
00043 void SysTick_Handler(void);
00044 
00045 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00046 /*********************************************************************/
00051 void SysTick_Handler(void)
00052 {
00053         //Clear System Tick counter flag
00054         SYSTICK_ClearCounterFlag();
00055         //toggle P0.0
00056         if (Cur_State == ENABLE)
00057         {
00058                 //pull-down pin
00059                 GPIO_ClearValue(0, (1<<0));
00060                 Cur_State = DISABLE;
00061         }
00062         else
00063         {
00064                 GPIO_SetValue(0, (1<<0));
00065                 Cur_State = ENABLE;
00066         }
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00070 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00071 /*********************************************************************/
00076 int c_entry (void)
00077 {
00078         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00079         TIM_TIMERCFG_Type TIM_ConfigStruct;
00080         TIM_MATCHCFG_Type TIM_MatchConfigStruct;
00081 
00082         // Conifg P1.28 as MAT0.0
00083         PinCfg.Funcnum = 3;
00084         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00085         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00086         PinCfg.Portnum = 1;
00087         PinCfg.Pinnum = 28;
00088         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00089 
00090         /* P3.26 as STCLK */
00091         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00092         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00093         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00094         PinCfg.Portnum = 3;
00095         PinCfg.Pinnum = 26;
00096         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00097 
00098         // Initialize timer 0, prescale count time of 10uS
00099         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleOption = TIM_PRESCALE_USVAL;
00100         TIM_ConfigStruct.PrescaleValue  = 10;
00101 
00102         // use channel 0, MR0
00103         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchChannel = 0;
00104         // Disable interrupt when MR0 matches the value in TC register
00105         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.IntOnMatch   = TRUE;
00106         //Enable reset on MR0: TIMER will reset if MR0 matches it
00107         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ResetOnMatch = TRUE;
00108         //Stop on MR0 if MR0 matches it
00109         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.StopOnMatch  = FALSE;
00110         //Toggle MR0.0 pin if MR0 matches it
00111         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.ExtMatchOutputType =TIM_EXTMATCH_TOGGLE;
00112         // Set Match value, count value of 10 (10 * 10uS = 100uS --> 10KHz)
00113         TIM_MatchConfigStruct.MatchValue   = 10;
00114 
00115         TIM_Init(LPC_TIM0, TIM_TIMER_MODE,&TIM_ConfigStruct);
00116         TIM_ConfigMatch(LPC_TIM0,&TIM_MatchConfigStruct);
00117         TIM_Cmd(LPC_TIM0,ENABLE);
00118 
00119         GPIO_SetDir(0, (1<<0), 1); //Set P0.0 as output
00120 
00121         //Use P0.0 to test System Tick interrupt
00122         /* Initialize System Tick with 10ms time interval
00123          * Frequency input = 10kHz /2 = 5kHz
00124          * Time input = 10ms
00125          */
00126         SYSTICK_ExternalInit(5000, 10);
00127         //Enable System Tick interrupt
00128         SYSTICK_IntCmd(ENABLE);
00129         //Enable System Tick Counter
00130         SYSTICK_Cmd(ENABLE);
00131 
00132         while(1);
00133         return 1;
00134 }
00135 
00136 
00137 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00138    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00139    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00140    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00141    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00142 int main(void)
00143 {
00144     return c_entry();
00145 }

00152 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number
00153 * @return               None
00154 *******************************************************************************/
00155 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00156 {
00157         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00158          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00159 
00160         /* Infinite loop */
00161         while(1);
00162 }
